snippet: Does Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu have an alternative to a two-state solution?
abstract: Editorial notes Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu has presented conflicting attitudes toward possibility of two-state peace agreement with Palestinians; points out Netanyahu has appeared supportive of idea at times, but skeptical at others; warns time is running out to create framework for deal and that Israel appears to have no other option.
lead_paragraph: Does Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu have an alternative to a two-state solution?
